name: Youtube Full Player
description:
Expands the Youtube player to take up the whole window, excluding the navbar.
A little wonky on lower sizes (Less than 880 px wide), The video will be full height but not full width.
additional_info:
If the stylish preview pics are too small, try the full-size versions:

Primary:
https://suplex.me/d7d6.jpg
< 880 px:
https://suplex.me/8cf1.png
